thread.section_title: Hotel Dupond-Smith - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: LOVELY, SMALL LUXURIOUS HOTEL
thread.title_full: LOVELY, SMALL LUXURIOUS HOTEL - Review of Hotel Dupond-Smith, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JONATANLOTER
title: LOVELY, SMALL LUXURIOUS HOTEL
text:
I stayed at this lovely hotel in November 2016, and I've booked it again for April 2017.
The room was just perfect: size, decoration, pillows, everything was pretty good.
The bathroom: AMAZING! Except that mine (only bathroom out of 8 rooms) had no shower curtain and the floor was full of water when I got a shower. I had to use lots of towels to clean the floor.
The breakfast is very cute and personalized, with very good bread, ham, butter, eggs, juices, yogurts, etc.
The service was just EXCELLENT. From the manager to the stuff, excellent.
Location can't be better if you enjoy Le Marais.
The one thing that you should be aware is that the internet service the hotel has is not good. The internet went out at 10pm and the guy who was at night couldn't fix it until the manager arrived next day.
Conclusion: If you enjoy very small hotels with just a few staff members, this hotel is right for you. But if you prefer to have people in the lobby, huge facilities, and lots of staff, this hotel is not for you.
For instance, I decided to come back because I LOVED IT.
